About The MLSS

The Machine Learning Summer School will take place between the 26th of August and 6th of September, 2019 at Skoltech in Moscow, Russia. The MLSS offers an opportunity to learn about fundamental and advanced aspects of machine learning, data analysis and inference. Join us to learn from world-renowned machine learning specialists, network with a diverse and formidable audience, and enjoy Moscow!.' More ›
